shortDescription: Tekken 7 has reached another milestone with over 7 MILLION sales worldwide! Thank You to all our fans for their continued support, now get ready for the next battle!
The time has come! Feel the thrills of the most celebrate bikes,the emotions of the greatest champions, and face challenges like never before!
You've got 48 hours left to save big on Horizon Zero Dawn for PC. Grab the Complete Edition for $29.99 to uncover Aloy's destiny, but be quick - this sale ends on April 25!

cardHeader: Claim Hand of Fate 2 & Alien:Isolation for Free!
shortDescription: Tempt fate in a living board game set in a world of dark fantasy, or discover the true meaning of fear facing mortals danger...in space. Claim Hand of Fate 2 & Alien:Isolation for Free! on the Epic Games Store until April 29!
